core_metrics.call_summary: The user initiated a call with the Mercola Health Coach but didn't have any specific questions or concerns. The conversation was brief and ended with the user saying goodbye. The assistant provided a polite closing message.

conversation_transcript.content: Hey there! I'm Pax, your Mercola Health Coach. How can I help you today?
It was nice chatting with you, even if it was brief. If you have any questions or need help in the future, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a wonderful day! Bye for now!
Thank you for contacting Mercola Health Coach! Feel free to reach out anytime you need help. Take care!

notes: The call was very brief and didn't involve any specific topic or question related to the health coach services. The user didn't express any frustration or concern.
